name: Jared Leto dash 3 in 1
description:
it's a jared leto inspired theme which has 3 in 1 features..where the dashboard icons are 30stm glyphics and the tumblr logo is ECHELON..i personally prefer the other theme i made which is exactly like this one but a more improved version http://userstyles.org/styles/52609/jared-leto-nebula-dashboard-theme
Follow me on tumblr rockstarinthemakingg.tumblr.com and comment :) i would like to know what u guys think :)
in case you don't know how to install just send me a message on my tumblr and i'll help u out and check out the log in page which is right under the "more screen shoots"
I FIXED SOMETHING SO REINSTALL IT!!!!
